dt: {bc}capable of arousing emotions of tenderness or compassion

pt: {sc}moving{/sc} {sc}impressive{/sc} {sc}poignant{/sc} {sc}affecting{/sc} {sc}touching{/sc} {sc}pathetic{/sc} mean having the power to produce deep emotion. {sc}moving{/sc} may apply to any strong emotional effect including thrilling, agitating, saddening, or calling forth pity or sympathy.
{sc}impressive{/sc} implies compelling attention, admiration, wonder, or conviction.
{sc}poignant{/sc} applies to what keenly or sharply affects one's sensitivities.
{sc}affecting{/sc} is close to {sc}moving{/sc} but most often suggests pathos.

pt.t: the {it}touching{/it} innocence in a child's eyes

pt: {sc}pathetic{/sc} implies moving to pity or sometimes contempt.

shortdef: capable of arousing emotions of tenderness or compassion

dt: {bc}to bring a bodily part into contact with especially so as to perceive through the tactile sense {bc}handle or feel gently usually with the intent to understand or appreciate
{bc}to put hands upon in any way or degree

dt.t: don't {wi}touch{/wi} anything before the police come

dt: {bc}to take into the hands or mouth
{bc}to strike or push lightly especially with the hand or foot or an implement
{bc}to cause to be briefly in contact or conjunction with something

dt.t: a sticky situation and I wouldn't {wi}touch{/wi} it with a 10-foot pole
nothing can {wi}touch{/wi} that cloth for durability

dt: {bc}to speak or tell of especially in passing

dt.t: barely {wi}touched{/wi} the incident in the speech

dt: {bc}to leave a mark or impression on
{bc}to harm slightly by or as if by contact {bc}{sx|taint||}, {sx|blemish||}
{bc}to give a delicate tint, line, or expression to
{bc}to get a hit off or score a run against
{bc}to draw or delineate with light strokes
{bc}to lay hands upon (one afflicted with scrofula) with intent to heal
{bc}to perform (a melody) by playing or singing
{bc}to feel something with a body part (such as the hand or foot)
{bc}to lay hand or finger on a person to cure disease (such as scrofula)
{bc}to treat a topic in a brief or casual manner
{bc}to make a brief or incidental stop on shore during a trip by water

dt.t: coming in from the cold to {it}touch base{/it} with civilization

pt: {sc}affect{/sc} {sc}influence{/sc} {sc}touch{/sc} {sc}impress{/sc} {sc}strike{/sc} {sc}sway{/sc} mean to produce or have an effect upon. {sc}affect{/sc} implies the action of a stimulus that can produce a response or reaction.
{sc}influence{/sc} implies a force that brings about a change (as in nature or behavior).

pt.t: our beliefs are {it}influenced{/it} by our upbringing

pt: {sc}touch{/sc} may carry a vivid suggestion of close contact and may connote stirring, arousing, or harming.

pt.t: his emotions were {it}touched{/it} by her distress

pt: {sc}impress{/sc} stresses the depth and persistence of the effect.

pt.t: only one of the plans {it}impressed{/it} him

pt: {sc}strike{/sc}, similar to but weaker than {it}impress{/it}, may convey the notion of sudden sharp perception or appreciation.

pt.t: {it}struck{/it} by the solemnity of the occasion

pt: {sc}sway{/sc} implies the acting of influences that are not resisted or are irresistible, with resulting change in character or course of action.

pt.t: politicians who are {it}swayed{/it} by popular opinion

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}tucher, tuchier{/it}, from Vulgar Latin {it}*toccare{/it} to knock, strike a bell, touch, probably of imitative origin
shortdef: to bring a bodily part into contact with especially so as to perceive through the tactile sense : handle or feel gently usually with the intent to understand or appreciate
to put hands upon in any way or degree; especially : to commit violence upon
to take into the hands or mouth

dt: {bc}the bottom of something considered as its support {bc}{sx|foundation||}
{bc}that part of a bodily organ by which it is attached to another more central structure of the organism
{bc}the lower part of a wall, pier, or column considered as a separate architectural feature
{bc}the lower part of a complete architectural design (as of a monument)
{bc}a side or face {dx_def}see {dxt|face:1||5a(5)}{/dx_def} of a geometrical figure from which an altitude {dx_def}see {dxt|altitude||1c(1)}{/dx_def} can be constructed
{bc}a side or face on which the figure stands
{bc}a supporting or carrying ingredient (as of a medicine)
{bc}a first or bottom layer of something on which other elements are added

dt.t: Overnight, Utah's famous snow has freshly blanketed both runs, adding to a solid {wi}base{/wi} of three feet …

dt: {bc}something (as a group of people) that reliably provides support (such as for a business or political candidate)

dt.t: But I do believe that that's a very sore point with many Democrats and could be used to energize their {wi}base{/wi}.

dt: {bc}the economic factors on which all legal, social, and political relations are formed
{bc}the starting point or line for an action or undertaking

dt.t: plans to make this city his {wi}base{/wi} of operation
The company has its {wi}base{/wi} in London.
The troops were ordered back to {wi}base{/wi}.

dt: {bc}the place from which a military force draws supplies
{bc}a number (such as 5 in 5{sup}6.44{/sup} or 5{sup}7{/sup}) that is raised to a power {dx_def}see {dxt|power:1||5a}{/dx_def}
{bc}the number that when raised to a power equal to the logarithm of a number yields the number itself

dt.t: The logarithm of 100 to the {wi}base{/wi} 10 is 2 since 10{sup}2{/sup} = 100.

dt: {bc}a number equal to the number of units in a given digit's place {dx_def}see {dxt|place:1||8}{/dx_def} that for a given system of writing numbers is required to give the numeral 1 in the next higher place

dt.t: The decimal system uses a {wi}base{/wi} of 10.

dt: {bc}such a system of writing numbers using an indicated base
{bc}a number that is multiplied by a rate or of which a percentage or fraction is calculated

dt.t: To find the interest on $90 at 10 percent multiply the {wi}base{/wi} 90 by .10.

dt: {bc}any one of the four stations at the corners of a baseball or softball {d_link|infield|infield}

{bc}any of various typically water-soluble and bitter tasting compounds that in solution have a pH greater than 7, are capable of reacting with an {d_link|acid|acid:1} to form a salt, and are molecules or ions able to take up a proton from an acid or able to give up an unshared pair of electrons to an acid
{bc}any of the five {d_link|purine|purine} or {d_link|pyrimidine|pyrimidine} bases of DNA and RNA that include cytosine, guanine, adenine, thymine, and uracil
{bc}a price level at which a security {dx_def}see {dxt|security||3}{/dx_def} previously declining in price resists further decline
{bc}the lower part of a heraldic field {dx_def}see {dxt|field:1||3c}{/dx_def}
{bc}the part of a {d_link|transformational grammar|transformational grammar} that consists of rules and a lexicon and generates the {d_link|deep structures|deep structure} of a language
{bc}an electrode that modulates the current flowing through a {d_link|bipolar|bipolar} junction transistor according to the voltage applied to the electrode

dt.t: This gate, which is called a grid in a tube and a {wi}base{/wi} in a transistor, enables a small "controlling" voltage to turn on and off a much larger voltage between the cathode and the anode.

dt: {bc}to do or include everything that needs to be done or included {bc}to fulfill all requirements or necessities

dt.t: The well rounded menu {wi}covers all the bases{/wi}—pork or duck breast and always a grilled chicken with complementary sauces and relishes …

In other words, we need to {wi}cover every base{/wi}. Too often, something is remembered at the last minute and we find ourselves waiting for the stores to open on sale day so we can purchase a much-needed item.

In your e-mail, let the company know that, for their convenience, you're e-mailing the resume and letter, but that the original documents will arrive by postal service. This way you've {wi}got all your bases covered{/wi}.

dt: {bc}to mention every subject that needs to be considered

dt.t: a speech that {wi}touches all the bases{/wi}

dt: {bc}to do or include everything that needs to be done or included {bc}to fulfill all requirements or necessities

dt.t: need to {wi}touch all the bases{/wi} when applying for a mortgage
The owner of the Utah Stars is in Salt Lake City, working 24 hours a day in an effort to {wi}touch every base{/wi} to keep his club in Utah's capital city.

art.capt: base of a column: {it}1{/it} upper torus, {it}2{/it} scotia, {it}3{/it} lower torus, {it}4{/it} plinth, {it}5{/it} shaft, {it}6{/it} fillets

shortdef: the bottom of something considered as its support : foundation
that part of a bodily organ by which it is attached to another more central structure of the organism
the lower part of a wall, pier, or column considered as a separate architectural feature

{bc}to cause to explode by or as if by touching with fire

to cause to explode by or as if by touching with fire
to describe or characterize with precision
